description: Implement parallel step executor with background job management and wait-for-completion logic

inputs: Array of steps to execute in parallel
validation: Track PIDs of all running jobs
Wait for all jobs to complete
features: Execute N steps in parallel as background jobs
Assign unique temp files for stdout/stderr per job
Monitor job completion with 'wait' or polling
Kill all jobs if one fails critically
Timeout handling (kill jobs after max duration)

acceptance_criteria: Successfully runs 3+ bash commands in parallel
Correctly waits for all jobs to complete
Captures stdout/stderr from each job separately
Includes test with intentional job failure
Respects timeout limits and kills long-running jobs
